scripts.example:ansi: cd examples && nodemon --exec 'elm-esm make src/AnsiExample.elm --output=dist/example-elm-ansi.js' --watch ../src --watch src -e elm
scripts.example:ink: cd examples && nodemon --exec 'elm-esm make src/InkExample.elm --output=dist/example-elm-ink.js' --watch ../src --watch src -e elm
